## LegacyScopedClusterClient.callAsCurrentUser() method

Calls specified `endpoint` with provided `clientParams` on behalf of the user initiated request to the OpenSearch Dashboards server (via HTTP request headers). See [LegacyAPICaller](./opensearch-dashboards.legacyapicaller.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
callAsCurrentUser(endpoint: string, clientParams?: Record<string, any>, options?: LegacyCallAPIOptions): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  endpoint | string | String descriptor of the endpoint e.g. <code>cluster.getSettings</code> or <code>ping</code>. |
|  clientParams | Record&lt;string, any&gt; | A dictionary of parameters that will be passed directly to the OpenSearch JS client. |
|  options | [LegacyCallAPIOptions](./opensearch-dashboards.legacycallapioptions.md) | Options that affect the way we call the API and process the result. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;any&gt;
